properties.description: Set that slider is a form element               Value: slider
properties.name: _formelement

properties.description: Slider range value align               Different depending the orientation of the slider               Vertical slider: center               Horizontal slider: center, left or right               Default: right
properties.name: displayAlign

properties.description: Slider range value position               Different depending the orientation of the slider               Vertical slider: top, bottom, left or right               Horizontal slider: top & bottom               Default: valueless
properties.name: displayPosition

properties.description: Slider range value visibility               Default: false
properties.name: displayVisibility

properties.description: Slider maximum range value               Value must be an integer
properties.name: max

properties.description: Slider minimum range value               Value must be an integer
properties.name: min

properties.description: Slider orientation               Values can be: horizontal or vertical               Default: horizontal
properties.name: orientation

properties.description: Slider size respect to container               Value must be number percentage               Default: 50%
properties.name: size

methods.description: Funtionality when interacting with the slider               Only for thumb interaction and click interaction on iOS devices
methods.name: _interactionSlider

methods.description: Slider thumb movement and update slider value
methods.name: _thumbMotion

methods.description: Updates slider current vlaue and trigger onCHange callback
methods.name: _updateCurrentValue

methods.description: Updates disabled status and activates the thumb motion when it is not disabled
methods.name: _updateDisabled

params.description: control variable to check first time update slider
params.name: arg
